intro: Drop bouncy Countryballs into the box and merge them into big ones. Keep them inside the box and skillfully transform them into the largest Countryball!
description:
Welcome to the General Assembly of the United Countryballs, where your skills will be put to the test.

As Secretary General, your job is to drop small Countryballs into the box and skillfully merge them into larger ones. But beware – these balls are bouncy and mischievous! Keep them contained within the box, or you are fired!

Should you encounter a particularly troublesome Countryball, fear not! Deploy the powerful United Zapper to zap it out of existence.

Aim to achieve the highest score before your tenure ends, and compare your performance on the global leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to be the greatest Secretary General in history?
